code:
%%{HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-02.02 — Decay & Recompute Cycle (HealthTech_PatientRecords)

[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> TRIGGER : CronTick / RecomputeRequested / ParamsVersioned
note right of TRIGGER
  Entry conditions:
  • Scheduled batch tick (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
  • Manual backfill (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
  • Parameters changed (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
end note

TRIGGER --> LOAD_SNAPSHOT : Select ledger window
note right of LOAD_SNAPSHOT
  Load CPᵢ(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) snapshots and pending deltas
  Resolve idempotent ranges and gaps
end note

LOAD_SNAPSHOT --> CHECK_PARAMS : Bind constants (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
note right of CHECK_PARAMS
  λ = ln(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)/T  (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
  α ∈ (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)    (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
  If new version → tag run with ParamVersionID
end note

CHECK_PARAMS --> APPLY_DECAY : InputBound
note right of APPLY_DECAY
  Apply time decay to each CPᵢ since t₀:
  CPᵢ(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) = CPᵢ(HealthTech_PatientRecords) · e^(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer) + Σ(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
end note

APPLY_DECAY --> RECOMPUTE_W : DecayApplied (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
note right of RECOMPUTE_W
  Recompute voting weights:
  Wᵢ = (HealthTech_PatientRecords)^α
  Prepare diffs for persistence & metrics
end note

RECOMPUTE_W --> WRITE_BACK : WeightsComputed
note right of WRITE_BACK
  Persist CP/W snapshots + audit trail
  Mark run as deterministic (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
end note

WRITE_BACK --> EMIT_EVENTS : LedgerCommitted
note right of EMIT_EVENTS
  Emit CPUpdated / WeightsUpdated for Metrics (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
  Optionally trigger Resonance recompute (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
end note

EMIT_EVENTS --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] : RecomputeFinished (HealthTech_PatientRecords)

%% ---- Exceptional & maintenance paths ----
LOAD_SNAPSHOT --> RECONCILE : GapDetected / CorrectionInput
note right of RECONCILE
  Backfill missing windows, reconcile oracles
  (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
end note
RECONCILE --> APPLY_DECAY : Reconciled

APPLY_DECAY --> ABORT : InvariantBreach / AnomalyDetected
RECOMPUTE_W --> ABORT : InvariantBreach
ABORT --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] : RecomputeAborted

%% =========== Styling ===========
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class TRIGGER,LOAD_SNAPSHOT,CHECK_PARAMS,APPLY_DECAY,RECOMPUTE_W,WRITE_BACK,EMIT_EVENTS,RECONCILE,ABORT core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
